lead_paragraph: Barcelona defender Dani Alves launched a foul-mouthed tirade on social media on Friday over football coverage by the Spanish press.

headline.print_headline: Barca's Alves Launches Foul-Mouthed Tirade Against Media
headline.main: Barca's Alves Launches Foul-Mouthed Tirade Against Media

snippet: Barcelona defender Dani Alves launched a foul-mouthed tirade on social media on Friday over football coverage by the Spanish press....
